forum.content:
used to be , U&Me
親愛的,你曾經是我的 superman
now l'm flying solo
親愛的,你曾經是100分的男孩
now u on the low-low
事情是不是原來的樣子
we ain't a thing like we used to be
we used to be like Jay&Beyonce
Brad&Angelin
we do not gossip & rumors come
between us once
相愛的羨煞旁人
we ain't like we used to be
that used to be us

我們說好要收集每一個夏天的顏色
在家看電影 搶著搖控器
we was like family
Don't front with me l know u missin
what we used to be

can u even blame me boy
for feeling like u threw it all away
l'mma let u crown your rebound king
but that ain't nothing like we used to be

used to be U&Me
forum.title: used to be
